summary: This module implements the data migration logic required to upgrade application environment configurations from version 0.10.0 to 0.11.0. It defines forward and backward transformation utilities that reshape legacy records into the new schema, and manages the association of image assets with specific application variants using Beanie document models.
business_intent: Enable seamless version upgrades by automatically converting existing environment settings to the updated format, preserving compatibility and data integrity while supporting both forward and rollback migration paths.
